name: Sea Breeze
description:
A wholesome slice of adventure! Relax and explore the bay as Oscar the Otter, make friends with the locals, collect, and fish!

Join Oscar as he goes on a summer vacation to the friendly sea side town of Kalokaíri. 

Controls: 

WASD - to move

Space - to jump

Left click - to interact

Tab - to see your inventory

F - to reset your position if you get stuck

No controller support at this point, sorry.

We'd love your feedback!

What do you like or hate about it? On a scale of 0-10, how much would you like to play a fuller, more polished version of this game?  Let us know in the comments below or with the in game feedback system! 

A prototype made in 2 weeks.
